content: Give me a list of 17 words that have 'ght' somewhere in them.

I'm here to help you with that! Here's a list of 17 words that contain the letter sequence 'ght':

1. Light
2. Slight
3. Flight
4. Night
5. Right
6. Fight
7. Height
8. Might
9. Bright
10. Plight
11. Fright
12. Tight
13. Sight
14. Weight
15. Daughter
16. Thought
17.rought

I hope this list meets your requirements! If you need any more assistance or have other questions, feel free to ask.
